{"version":"2.0","app":{"insightType":"CALCULATED_METRIC"},"dataNodes":{"LOAD_DATA_SOURCE0":{"id":"LOAD_DATA_SOURCE0","action":"load","parameters":{"dataset":{"label":"Asset","name":"ssot__Asset__dlm","creationType":"Standard","isExternal":false,"isExternalObjectInErrorStatus":false,"type":"dmo"},"fields":["ssot__Id__c","ssot__AssetLevelNumber__c","ssot__Name__c","ssot__AssetQuantity__c","ssot__AssetStatus__c","ssot__AvailablePercent__c","ssot__AverageUptimePerDayMinutesQuantity__c","ssot__BillToAccountId__c","ssot__CnsqncOfAssetFailure__c","ssot__CreatedById__c","ssot__CreatedDate__c","ssot__DataSourceId__c","ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c","ssot__Description__c","ssot__DigitalAssetStatus__c","ssot__DigitalAssetStatusReason__c","ssot__DowntimeSumQuantity__c","ssot__ExpectedUptimePercent__c","ssot__ExternalRecordId__c","ssot__GeocodeAccuracyType__c","ssot__InstallDateTime__c","ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c","ssot__IsCompetitorAsset__c","ssot__IsDeleted__c","ssot__isInternal__c","KQ_Id__c","KQ_LocationId__c","KQ_ParentAssetId__c","KQ_ProductId__c","KQ_RootAssetId__c","ssot__LastModifiedById__c","ssot__LastModifiedDate__c","ssot__Latitude__c","ssot__LocationId__c","ssot__Longitude__c","ssot__ManufactureDate__c","ssot__ParentAssetId__c","ssot__PriceAmount__c","ssot__PrimaryContactId__c","ssot__ProductId__c","ssot__ProductCodeText__c","ssot__ProductDescription__c","ssot__ProductFamilyName__c","ssot__PurchaseDate__c","ssot__RootAssetId__c","ssot__SerialNumber__c","ssot__ServicerAccountId__c","ssot__StockKeepingUnit__c","ssot__SupplierAccountId__c","ssot__SystemModstamp__c","ssot__TotalUsage__c","ssot__TotalUsageUnitOfMeasure__c","ssot__UniqueIdentifier__c","ssot__UnplannedDowntimeSumQuantity__c","ssot__UptimeRecordEndDateTime__c","ssot__UptimeRecordStartDateTime__c"]},"sources":[]},"LOAD_DATA_SOURCE1":{"id":"LOAD_DATA_SOURCE1","action":"load","parameters":{"dataset":{"label":"RecentRepairsKPI","name":"RecentRepairsKPI__cio","creationType":"Insights","isExternal":false,"is e":"field","valueType":"text","source":"JOIN2","value":"RecentRepairsKPI.recentrepairskpi__c"},"operator":"is_null","rightOperands":[]}]},"returnValue":{"resourceType":"constant","value":50,"valueType":"number"}}],"elseCondition":{"returnValue":{"resourceType":"field","value":"RecentRepairsKPI.recentrepairskpi__c","valueType":"text","source":"JOIN2"}}}]},"sources":["JOIN2"]},"CASE1":{"id":"CASE1","action":"case","parameters":{"cases":[{"name":"AssetAgeKPI","label":"AssetAgeKPI","returnValueType":"number","whenConditions":[{"expression":{"expressionType":"group","expressionValues":[{"expressionType":"condition","leftOperand":{"resourceType":"field","valueType":"text","source":"CASE0","value":"AssetAgeKPI.assetagekpi__c"},"operator":"is_null","rightOperands":[]}]},"returnValue":{"resourceType":"constant","value":50,"valueType":"number"}}],"elseCondition":{"returnValue":{"resourceType":"field","value":"AssetAgeKPI.assetagekpi__c","valueType":"text","source":"CASE0"}}}]},"sources":["CASE0"]},"CASE2":{"id":"CASE2","action":"case","parameters":{"cases":[{"name":"TotalUsageKPI","label":"TotalUsageKPI","returnValueType":"number","whenConditions":[{"expression":{"expressionType":"group","expressionValues":[{"expressionType":"condition","leftOperand":{"resourceType":"field","valueType":"text","source":"CASE1","value":"TotalUsageKPI.totalusagekpi__c"},"operator":"is_null","rightOperands":[]}]},"returnValue":{"resourceType":"constant","value":50,"valueType":"number"}}],"elseCondition":{"returnValue":{"resourceType":"field","value":"TotalUsageKPI.totalusagekpi__c","valueType":"text","source":"CASE1"}}}]},"sources":["CASE1"]},"ARITHMETIC_EXPRESSION0":{"id":"ARITHMETIC_EXPRESSION0","action":"arithmetic_expression","parameters":{"expressions":[{"name":"AssetHealthScoreVar","label":"AssetHealthScoreVar","expression":[{"expressionType":"group","expressionValues":[{"expressionType":"group","expressionValues":[{"expressionType":"operand","resource":{"resourceType":"constant","value":1,"valueType":"number"}},{"operator":"divide","expressionType":"operator"},{"expressionType":"operand","resource":{"resourceType":"constant","value":3,"valueType":"number"}}]},{"operator":"multiply","expressionType":"operator"},{"expressionType":"operand","resource":{"resourceType":"field","valueType":"text","value":"RecentRepairsKPI","source":"CASE2"}}]},{"operator":"add","expressionType":"operator"},{"expressionType":"group","expressionValues":[{"expressionType":"group","expressionValues":[{"expressionType":"operand","resource":{"resourceType":"constant","value":1,"valueType":"number"}},{"operator":"divide","expressionType":"operator"},{"expressionType":"operand","resource":{"resourceType":"constant","value":3,"valueType":"number"}}]},{"operator":"multiply","expressionType":"operator"},{"expressionType":"operand","resource":{"resourceType":"field","valueType":"text","value":"AssetAgeKPI","source":"CASE2"}}]},{"operator":"add","expressionType":"operator"},{"expressionType":"group","expressionValues":[{"expressionType":"group","expressionValues":[{"expressionType":"operand","resource":{"resourceType":"constant","value":1,"valueType":"number"}},{"operator":"divide","expressionType":"operator"},{"expressionType":"operand","resource":{"resourceType":"constant","value":3,"valueType":"number"}}]},{"operator":"multiply","expressionType":"operator"},{"expressionType":"operand","resource":{"resourceType":"field","valueType":"text","value":"TotalUsageKPI","source":"CASE2"}}]}]}]},"sources":["CASE2"]},"CASE3":{"id":"CASE3","action":"case","parameters":{"cases":[{"name":"AssetHealthScoreSymbolVar","label":"AssetHealthScoreSymbolVar","returnValueType":"text","whenConditions":[{"expression":{"expressionType":"group","expressionValues":[{"expressionType":"condition","leftOperand":{"resourceType":"field","valueType":"text","source":"ARITHMETIC_EXPRESSION0","value":"AssetHealthScoreVar"},"operator":"greater_or_equal","rightOperands":[{"resourceType":"constant","value":66,"valueType":"number"}]}]},"returnValue":{"resourceType":"constant","value":"Looking if RecentRepairsKPI is Null","type":"CASE","top":112,"left":672},"CASE1":{"label":"Check if AssetAgeKPI is Null","type":"CASE","top":112,"left":812},"CASE2":{"label":"Check if TotalUsageKPI is Null","type":"CASE","top":112,"left":952},"ARITHMETIC_EXPRESSION0":{"label":"Calculate Score","type":"ARITHMETIC_EXPRESSION","top":112,"left":1092},"CASE3":{"label":"Map Value to Output","type":"AGGREGATE","top":112,"left":1372}},"connectors":[{"targetNodeId":"JOIN0","sourceNodeId":"LOAD_DATA_SOURCE0"},{"targetNodeId":"JOIN0","sourceNodeId":"LOAD_DATA_SOURCE1"},{"targetNodeId":"JOIN1","sourceNodeId":"JOIN0"},{"targetNodeId":"JOIN1","sourceNodeId":"LOAD_DATA_SOURCE2"},{"targetNodeId":"JOIN2","sourceNodeId":"JOIN1"},{"targetNodeId":"JOIN2","sourceNodeId":"LOAD_DATA_SOURCE3"},{"targetNodeId":"CASE0","sourceNodeId":"JOIN2"},{"targetNodeId":"CASE1","sourceNodeId":"CASE0"},{"targetNodeId":"CASE2","sourceNodeId":"CASE1"},{"targetNodeId":"ARITHMETIC_EXPRESSION0","sourceNodeId":"CASE2"},{"targetNodeId":"CASE3","sourceNodeId":"ARITHMETIC_EXPRESSION0"},{"targetNodeId":"AGGREGATE0","sourceNodeId":"CASE3"}]}}
DataCalcInsightTemplate.description: Uses the RecentRepairsKPI, TotalUsageKPI, and AssetAgeKPI Calculated Insights to assign assets an overall health score.
DataCalcInsightTemplate.expression: SELECT SUM((( ( 1 / 3 ) * CASE WHEN (isnull(RecentRepairsKPI__cio.recentrepairskpi__c)) THEN 50 ELSE RecentRepairsKPI__cio.recentrepairskpi__c END ) + ( ( 1 / 3 ) * CASE WHEN (isnull(AssetAgeKPI__cio.assetagekpi__c)) THEN 50 ELSE AssetAgeKPI__cio.assetagekpi__c END ) + ( ( 1 / 3 ) * CASE WHEN (isnull(TotalUsageKPI__cio.totalusagekpi__c)) THEN 50 ELSE TotalUsageKPI__cio.totalusagekpi__c END ))) AS assethealthscore__c, ssot__Asset__dlm.ssot__Id__c AS assetid__c, CASE WHEN (( ( 1 / 3 ) * CASE WHEN (isnull(RecentRepairsKPI__cio.recentrepairskpi__c)) THEN 50 ELSE RecentRepairsKPI__cio.recentrepairskpi__c END ) + ( ( 1 / 3 ) * CASE WHEN (isnull(AssetAgeKPI__cio.assetagekpi__c)) THEN 50 ELSE AssetAgeKPI__cio.assetagekpi__c END ) + ( ( 1 / 3 ) * CASE WHEN (isnull(TotalUsageKPI__cio.totalusagekpi__c)) THEN 50 ELSE TotalUsageKPI__cio.totalusagekpi__c END )) >= 66 THEN 'Looking good' WHEN (( ( 1 / 3 ) * CASE WHEN (isnull(RecentRepairsKPI__cio.recentrepairskpi__c)) THEN 50 ELSE RecentRepairsKPI__cio.recentrepairskpi__c END ) + ( ( 1 / 3 ) * CASE WHEN (isnull(AssetAgeKPI__cio.assetagekpi__c)) THEN 50 ELSE AssetAgeKPI__cio.assetagekpi__c END ) + ( ( 1 / 3 ) * CASE WHEN (isnull(TotalUsageKPI__cio.totalusagekpi__c)) THEN 50 ELSE TotalUsageKPI__cio.totalusagekpi__c END )) <= 33 THEN 'Critical' ELSE 'Warning' END AS assethealthscoresymbol__c, ssot__Asset__dlm.KQ_Id__c AS keyqualifierassetid__c FROM ssot__Asset__dlm LEFT OUTER JOIN RecentRepairsKPI__cio ON (ssot__Asset__dlm.ssot__Id__c = RecentRepairsKPI__cio.assetid__c) LEFT OUTER JOIN AssetAgeKPI__cio ON (ssot__Asset__dlm.ssot__Id__c = AssetAgeKPI__cio.assetid__c) LEFT OUTER JOIN TotalUsageKPI__cio ON (ssot__Asset__dlm.ssot__Id__c = TotalUsageKPI__cio.assetid__c) GROUP BY assetid__c, assethealthscoresymbol__c, keyqualifierassetid__c
